journal-title-group.journal-title: Journal of Money, Credit and Banking

title-group.article-title: Commodity Prices, Money Surprises, and Fed Credibility: Comment

p.mixed-citation: Papell observed overshooting of the mark/dollar exchange rate for the entire 1973.11 to 1981LIV period, it is acknowledged that "while [his] sample period [was] too short to formally test for a change in the money supply rule," his approach predicts "that a less accommodative American monet- ary policy will increase the amount of overshooting" (p. 294). 294
